messages.subject: lucid dreams was Re: Toni Morrison quote
messages.msgSnippet: ... if it s just more common than I realize or if it s just more common among unschoolers? I ve heard about these dreams from lots of people. I think it s a
messages.messageBody:
>>I've never heard anyone else mention having those dreams. I wonder
if it's just more common than I realize or if it's just more common
among unschoolers?>>

I've heard about these dreams from lots of people. I think it's a pretty
commom reaction to stress. I guess for lots of people school is the ultimate
stress metaphor.

>>And Mary, how in the world do you stop in the middle of your dream
to say something to yourself? I don't ever realize that I'm dreaming until
after I wake up.>>

It was very cool. Like someone else mentioned, it's called lucid dreaming. I
think I have just gotten to the point in my life where I have truly let go
of the power that things like school have over me. In the dream I actually
thought it was dumb that I was stressing over an institution like school.
Even in my subconscious I believe unschooling is best. :o)

Life is good.
~Mary
